section.title: XLattice Applications
section.p: These are software packages based on XLattice components. An XLattice application is delivered with all necessary jars except for the Java runtime package itself.

section.title: About To Be Released
section.p: XLattice currently has two applications in development.

ul.li: CryptoServer, a lightweight, secure, and very fast Web server
ShareDev, a set of tools using peer-to-peer technologies to support cooperative software development

section.p: An early release of the CryptoServer is expected in January of 2005. Components are available in CVS. For moderately reliable information on progress in CryptoServer development, see its roadmap.
